12 Pj001-001 brgyad stong ka 1b1-365a7 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa a r+ya aSh+Ta sA ha sri ka pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta
8 Pj002-001 'bum Ka 1b1- a 450a7 shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa sha ta sa ha sri ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta 'di ni bsam yas dang lha sa'i rig zing mtshams mi 'da' la sogs pa la gtugs nas/ zhus dag lan bcu drug byas pa'i/ rgyan gong gi 'bum nag mtshams mi 'da' la phyi mo byas nas/ dag par gtugs pa'i 'bum sdig ma 'dres zhes bya ba'i gser 'bum bcu gnyis dum/ lo tsa ba chen po thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin chen grub kyi thugs dam la phyi mo bgyis nas/ mkhas chen rin chen rgyal mtshan pas bzhengs pa la ma phyi bgyis pa'o/ /'di'i dge ba rnams dkar dri med kyis/ phams gtso byas mkha' mnyam sems can dang/ bdag sogs 'khor ba'i rgud pa kun bral nas/ rnam mkhyen sangs rgyas go 'phang myur thob shog
45 Pj014-001 dkon brtsegs Ka 1b1-54a2 sdom pa gsum bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo tri sam+ba ra nir de sha pa ri barta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ sdom pa gsum bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u dang po rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa
46 Pj014-002 dkon brtsegs Ka 54a2-120b4 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya a nan ta mu kha pa ri sho d+ha na nir de sha pa ri barta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ran dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
47 Pj014-003 dkon brtsegs Ka 120b4-254a1 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya ta thA ga ta a tsin tya nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste le'u gsum pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ dA na shI la dang/ mu ni bar ma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa
48 Pj014-004 dkon brtsegs Ka 254a1-298a4 'phags pa rmi lam bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya sAp+na nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ rmi lam bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa rdzogs so/
49 Pj014-005 dkon brtsegs Ka 298a4-340a7 'phags pa 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya a mi tA b+ha byu ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing go yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u lnga pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ dA na shI la dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa
50 Pj015-001 dkon brtsegs Kha 1b1-85a7 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya a k+Shi b+hya ta thA ga ta sya byu ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
51 Pj015-002 dkon brtsegs Kha 85a7-172a7 'phags pa go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya warma byU ha nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so
52 Pj015-003 dkon brtsegs Kha 172a7-201a6 'phags pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya d+harma shA tu pra krI ti a sam b+he da nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa
53 Pj015-004 dkon brtsegs Kha 210a6-227a7 'phags pa chos bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya da sha d+harma ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos bcu pa'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

55 Pj015-006 dkon brtsegs Kha 239b7-312a7 'phags pa 'od zer kun du bkye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya rashmi sa man+ta muk+ta nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'od zer kun tu bkye ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so
56 Pj015-007 dkon brtsegs Kha 312a3- Ga 274b2 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya bo d+hi sa tva pi Ta ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po A ts+tshaR+Ya su ren dra bo d+hi dang / shI lan dra dang / A tsaR+Ya d+harma tA shI las bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o

2 Pj024-001 'dul ba Ca 1b1-23a6 so sor thar pa'i mdo pra ti mo k+Sha sU tra so sor thar pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ /dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan pa'i bka' lung gis/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
3 Pj024-002 'dul ba Ca 23a6- Nya 313a7 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa bi na ya bi b+hang ga 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa rdzogs so/ /dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che'i bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 'di la sh+lo ka ni nyi khri lnga stong yod/ bam po brgyad cu rtsa gsum du byas so
4 Pj028-001 'dul ba Ta 1b1-29b4 dge slong ma'i so sor thar ba'i mdo b+hi k+Shu NI pra ti mo k+Sha sU tra dge slong ma'i so sor thar pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba cog ro klu'i rgya mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
5 Pj028-002 'dul ba Ta 29b4-363a7 dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa b+hi k+Shu NI bi na ya bi b+hang+ga kha che'i mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang/ d+harmA ka ra dang/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang/ lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /snga zhus kun dga'o shA'i dpal/ gnyis kyis ma dag dri ma bsel/ /gsum zhus mkhas pa snar thang dpon slob pas/ /sa yi steng 'dir legs par dag bgyis so
6 Pj029-001 'dul ba Tha 1b1- Da 380a7 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi bi na ya k+Shu dra ka bastu 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal 'byor gyis bsgyur/ 'dul ba lung phran tshegs kyi gzhi 'di sgyur ba'i dus su lo ts+tsha ba mang pos dum bu mang por bgos te so sor tha dad du bsgyur bas glegs bam du sdom pa'i dus su gnas tha dad du 'thor nas ma tshang bzhin du bsdebs pas/ lung phran tshegs phal che ba mtshang bar bzhugs pa la/ slad kyis la stod 'ol rgod kyi gtsug lag khang du gnas brtan dar ma seng+gesa lung sde bzhi bzhengs ba'i tshe dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhing mo che ba byang chub seng+gesa phyag len mdzad nas spyir dbus gtsang gi gtsug lag khang rnams na bzhugs pa dang / khyad par du bsam yas mchims phu nas dgas chung ba dang/ dge slong tshul khrim yon tan gyis rnyed pa'i lung rnams dpe yon dang 'bad rtsol chen pos brtsal te/ de dag la gtugs pas/ lung phran tshegs kha cig la mi bzhugs pa/ kha cig la bzhugs pa rnams kyis bskangs nas bsabs pa ni bam po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i dbu sman chen po'i gtam rgyud kyi skabs nas/ sman chen pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na skyugs shig dang / bden nam brdzun blta'o zhes smras pa dang zhes bya ba nas bam po sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i dbu/ ji tsam na de grong khyer nas byung ba dang / bram ze mong rtul zhes bya bas gos kyi mtha' ma nas 'jus nas zhes bya ba'i bar du bam po gcig chad pa bskangs/ sdom ni/ de yang sman gyis de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i 'og tu yig tshar gcig chad pa bskangs/ de nas bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi ba'i smad ne tsho spyod gsal gyi skabs rdzogs pa'i/ e ma'o 'di ltar khyod mkhas pa sha stag dang phrad pa ni bsod nams dang ldan no zhes smras so/ zhes bya ba nas bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i stod/ /spyi'i sdom ni/ dge slong ma'i bkur sti bri zhes bya ba'i bar du bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i smad nas bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i stod kyi bar bam po dgu chad pa bskangs/ sdom tshig de'i 'og tu sdom tshig yig tshar gcig chad pa bskangs/ de nas bam po bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'i mjug / bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug gi gleng gzhi'i skabs kyi/ dge sbyong rnams kyi yon po'i spyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu la sa slar logs pa yin ni zhes bya ba nas/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i dbu/ de nas de'i tshe/ bram ze pad ma'i snying po khyim mchog gis mthon po zhig na shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rnams dang lhan cig 'dus zhing 'khod par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa chad pa bskangs so/ de nas bam po lnga bcu pa'i mjug /kun dga' bo la gdams ba'i skabs kyi/ kun dga' bo dge slong 'di lta bu ni bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan dang/ skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya nas bam po lnga bcu gnyis pa'i stod/ /bar sdom ni/ tsa pa dang tshe'i 'du byed mdzad ces bya ba'i bar du bam po gcig chad pa bskangs te/ spyir bsdoms na bam po bcu gnyis dang / sdom tshig yig tshar gnyis chad pa bskangs pa gang yin pa de nyid gangs can gyi gyi rgyud kyi gnas brtan chen po sdom brtson mkhas pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu gyur cing / 'dul ba dang / mdo sde dang / sde snod kyi ma mo 'dzin pa shAkyi dge slong she bya'i nam mkha' la mkhyen pa'i dkyil 'kho rgyas shing / snyan grags kyi 'od zer gyis/ phyogs kun tu khyab par gyur pa mchims thams cad mkhyen pas/ la stod 'ol rgod kyi gtsug lag khang nas dpe phyi gdan drangs nas bstan pa'i 'byung gnas dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang du lung sde bzhi tshang la dag par bzhengs shing / de nyid la dpe phyi byas shing / khyad par du'ang ma tshang pa kha bskangs pa'i phran tshegs de nyid la dpe phyi byas nas/ shAkya'i dge sbyong 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bzhengs pa'i bka' 'gyur dpe phyi la dgan drangs nas/ dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sde yis/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus kun du dar zhing rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ thub pa chen po'i bka'/ lung gzhi dang / dge slong pha ma'i rnam 'byed rnam pa gnyis dang / gzhung bla ma rnams kyi ma tshang ba kha bskong bar byed pa'i lung phran tshegs 'di dag cing tshang bar dpal gung thang gi gtsug lag khang du bzhengs so/ slad nas lung bzhengs pa rnams kyis kyang bam po'i grangs dbu nas rim pa bzhin du grangs 'di bzhin du bri bar bya'o

846 Pj056-001 'dus 'khor Ka 1b1-561a7 bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad / rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bi ma la pra chA nA ma mU la tan+t+ra nu sA ri NNI dvA da sha sA ha sri lA la ghu kA la tsa kra tan+t+ra rA dza TI ka
181 Pj057-001 mdo Tsa 1b1-92a6 'phags pa pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya panytsa pA ra mi tA nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
182 Pj057-002 mdo Tsa 92a5-114b4 'phags pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya dA na pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
183 Pj057-003 mdo Tsa 114b4-116a4 'phags pa sbyin pa'i phan yon bstan pa A r+ya dA nA nu shansa nirde sha 'phags pa sbyin pa'i phan yon bstan pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
184 Pj057-004 mdo Tsa 116a5-126b3 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya bo d+hi satva tsa r+yanir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
185 Pj057-005 mdo Tsa 126b3-170a2 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya ta thA ga ta gu Na dz+nyA na a tsin tya bi Sha ya a ba tA ra nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
186 Pj057-006 mdo Tsa 170a2-186b4 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs skyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya bud d+ha ba la bar d+ha na prA ti tA r+ya bi gurbA Na nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs skyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so
187 Pj057-007 mdo Tsa 186b4-226a6 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa A r+ya bud d+ha d+harma a tsin tya nir de shA snyan gyi gong rgyan rgyas pa chen po'i mdo le'u 'bum pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs so
188 Pj057-008 mdo Tsa 226a6-236a7 'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya dI paM ka ra bya ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dge dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa
189 Pj057-009 mdo Tsa 236a7-238a6 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya brahma shrI bya ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra sing+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+rasa zhus te gtan la phab pa
190 Pj057-010 mdo Tsa 238a6-267a2 'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya strI bi bartA byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ sh+lau ka drug brgya/ bam po gnyis pa'o
191 Pj057-011 mdo Tsa 267a2-289b4 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya tsan drot+ta rA dA ri kA byA ka ra nA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa
192 Pj057-012 mdo Tsa 289b4-292b5 'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya k+She ma ba tI byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so
193 Pj057-013 mdo Tsa 292b5-297b6 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa A r+ya shrI ya ma hA de bI byA ka ra Na 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so
194 Pj057-014 mdo Tsa 297b6-298b3 'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya dza ya ma ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so
195 Pj057-015 mdo Tsa 298b3-315a7 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya a ba lo ki nI nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa
196 Pj057-016 mdo Tsa 315a7-322b4 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya Many+dzu shrI bi ha ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
197 Pj057-017 mdo Tsa 322b4-326b4 'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya a mri ta byA ha ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
198 Pj057-018 mdo Tsa 326b4-353a4 'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya mai trI ya brasthA na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA barma dang/ dzi na mi tra dang/ su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
199 Pj057-019 mdo Tsa 353a4-361a6 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnam du skye ba blangs po'i mdo
'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnas su skye ba blangs pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ / zhu ba'i lo ts+tsha ba ban+de pa btong dang / ban+de shes rab seng+gesa rgya'i dpe las bsgyur
200 Pj057-020 mdo Tsa 361a6-367a7 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'thun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya lo kA nu barta na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa

202 Pj058-002 mdo Tsha 78a5-96b3 'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya ni ya ta ma ni ya ta ga ti mu drA a ba tA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
203 Pj058-003 mdo Tsha 96b3-100b6 'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya d+harma mu drA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /lo ts+tsha ba ban+de klu'i dbang po dang / lha'i zla bas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa
204 Pj058-004 mdo Tsha 100b6-114b5 'phags pa mar me 'bul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya pra dI pa dA nI yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa mar me 'bul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
205 Pj058-005 mdo Tsha 114b5-117a2 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya nA ga ra a ba lam bi kA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo ts+tshaba ban+de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra sing+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa

208 Pj058-008 mdo Tsha 138a5-141b5 'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya ma hA ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bad+yA ka ra sing+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa
209 Pj058-009 mdo Tsha 141b5-147a4 'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya sing ha nA di ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de sba rje ye shes snying pos bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa

211 Pj058-011 mdo Tsha 157b3-159b5 rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo pra tI tya sa mutpA dA di tsa bi b+hang+ga nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so
212 Pj058-012 mdo Tsha 159b5-161a1 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya pra tI tya sa mut pA da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur sing zhus te gtan la phab pa
213 Pj058-013 mdo Tsha 161a1-257b1 'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya ang gu li mA lI yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa sor mo'i 'phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de d+harma tA shI la dang / rgya'i lo ts+tsha ba ban+de tong A tsaR+Ya la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

220 Pj059-001 mdo Dza 1b1-97a6 sangs rgyas kyi sde snod tshul khrims 'chal pa tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bud d+ha pI Ta ka duH shI la ni gra hI nA ma ma ha yA na sU tra mdo sde rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa theg pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sde snod ces bya ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI pra b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong dpal gyi lhun pos/ pho brang lhan dkar du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

225 Pj059-006 mdo Dza 217a1-218b2 'phags pa gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya tri sha ra Na ga ma na nA ma ma ha yA na sU tra 'phags pa gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po [ ]sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

227 Pj059-008 mdo Dza 220b4-235a3 'phags pa rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya sarba bi da l+ya saM gra ha nA ma ma ha yA na sU tra 'phags pa rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / mu ni barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
228 Pj059-009 mdo Dza 235a3-280b4 'phags pa sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya bud d+ha sang gI ti nA ma ma ha yA na sU tra sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal dbyangs dang / dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus
229 Pj059-010 mdo Dza 280b4-330b1 de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo ta thA ga ta saM gI ti nA ma ma ha yA na sU tra de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal gyi dbyangs kyis bsgyur cing / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa
230 Pj059-011 mdo Dza 330b1-369a7 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo ma hA san ni pA tAd ma hA yA na sU tra ta thA ga ta shrI sa ma yan nA ma ma ha yA na sU tra 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa

232 Pj060-002 mdo Wa 136a1-263a3 'phags pa sprin chen po zhes bya ba thag pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya ma hA me gha nA ma ma ha yA na sU tra 'phags pa sprin chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa
233 Pj060-003 mdo Wa 263a3-302b6 'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo las phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le'u A r+ya ma hA me gha sU trAd da sha dig bo d+hi satva sa mu dra san ni pa ti ma hotsa ba bi krI Di ta nA ma pa ri barta mdo'i rgyal po chen po sprin chen po'i le'u re re la/ chos snang ba'i sgo stong phrag gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed yang dag par 'du ba snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal gyi glog gis gsal bar byas pa'i le'u chen po'i tshogs mtha' yas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las dga' ldan na gnas pa la sogs pa/ 'jig rten grangs med pa dang mthun par 'jug pa'i stobs la sbyor ba'i mthu las byung bas dbang byed cing/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa

235 Pj060-005 mdo Wa 308a5-324a2 'phags pa sprin chen po A r+ya ma hA me gha 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa che po'i mdo las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba drug cu rtsa bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan pa phab pa
236 Pj060-006 mdo Wa 324a2-352a5 bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug gtor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdo le'u stong phrag bcu pa las le'u bcu pa

237 Pj060-007 mdo Wa 352a5-366a7 gtsug tor chen po bam po dgu pa las bdud kyi le'u nyi tshe 'byung ba

238 Pj061-001 mdo Zha 1b1-118a7 'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya d+harma sang gI ti nA ma ma ha yA na sU tra 'phags pa chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa stong phrag brgya pa'i mdo las rtsom pa med kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI gar+b+ha dang / bi dza ya shI la dang shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa
239 Pj061-002 mdo Zha 118b1-293a2 'dus pa chen po las sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo da sha tsa kra k+Shi ti gar b+ha nA ma ma ha yA na sU tra 'dus pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ rgya'i mkhan po hwa shang zab mo la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de rnam par mi rtog gi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

242 Pj061-005 mdo Zha 371b7-376a7 'phags pa yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya pa ri Na ta tsa kra nA ma ma ha yA na sU tra yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ li'i dge slong sde snod gsum dang ldan pa shI la d+harmasa/ rgya gar gyi d+harma rgya'i ye ge las ban+de rnam par mi rtog gis bsgyur ba

chos kyi rgya mo rdzogs so
257 Pj062-015 mdo Za 109b7-293a3 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo A r+ya sU r+ya garb+ha nA ma ma hA bai pu l+yaM sU tra 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzog so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / d+harmA ka ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de bzang skyong gis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa

264 Pj063-003 mdo 'a 259b5-332b4 'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs te sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo

268 Pj064-002 mdo Ya 6a5-7b7 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya a tsin tya rA dza sU tra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so

274 Pj064-008 mdo Ya 33b1-40a7 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo chos kyi rnam grangs chen po A r+ya bud d+ha ma ku taM nA ma ma hA yA na sU traM ma hA d+harma pa r+yA yaM theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo chos kyi rnam grangs chen po rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya sing+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de de ben+d+ra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
275 Pj064-009 mdo Ya 40a7-50a1 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya bud d+ha b+hU mi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shi len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes Ti ka dang sbyar te gsar du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
276 Pj064-010 mdo Ya 50a1-55b4 'phags pa sangs rgyas mi spang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya bud d+hA k+She pa na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa sangs rgyas mi spang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
277 Pj064-011 mdo Ya 55b4-58b7 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya a Sh+Ta maNDa la kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'
278 Pj064-012 mdo Ya 59a1-61a4 'phags pa bkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya maM ga la a Sh+Ta kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa bkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'
279 Pj064-013 mdo Ya 61a4-61b5 'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa A r+ya bud d+ha a nu smri ti 'phags pa sangs rgyas rdzes su dran pa rdzogs so
280 Pj064-014 mdo Ya 61b5-62a2 chos rjes su dran pa d+harma a nu smri ti chos rgyas rdzes su dran pa rdzogs so
281 Pj064-015 mdo Ya 62a2-62a4 dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sang gha a nu smri ti dge 'dun rgyas rdzes su dran pa rdzogs so
282 Pj064-016 mdo Ya 62a4-62b3 bslab pa gsum gyi mdo Shi k+Sha tra ya nA ma sU tra bslab pa gsum gyi mdo rdzogs so
283 Pj064-017 mdo Ya 62b3-64b2 'phags pa sku gsum zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya tri kA ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa sku gsum zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so
284 Pj064-018 mdo Ya 64b2-85a1 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya tri skan d+ha ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa
285 Pj064-019 mdo Ya 85a1-87b5 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba
'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so
286 Pj064-020 mdo Ya 87b5-89b6 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba
'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa
287 Pj064-021 mdo Ya 89b6- Sha 281b7 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa A r+ya sad d+harma srmi tyu pasthA na stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug pa 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung/ /de rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /de yi 'gog pa gang yin pa/ /dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs/ /nye bar mkho ba thams cad legs par skrun pa la sogs pas phun sum tshogs pa'i dngos po mtha' dag dang ldan pas gzhi'i yon tan dang rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ sbyang zhing sgrin la skye bo thams cad blo dang ldan pas 'dzam bu'i gling yul rnams kyi mig tu dgongs nas/ ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni klung chen po 'bab pa chu bo gang gA'i 'gram gyis bsdus pa ches yangs par gyur pa rgya gar gyi yul lo/ de'i yang dbus su gtogs pa las shar gyi sha cha yul chen po shar phyogs ba len+d+ra zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang chen po ston pa'i bstan pa'i mig dang / rtsa ba dang / gzhi gyur pa/ dpal dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i sras phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal gyis gzhan las mtho bas mnga' cher sgyur ba'i sa'i bdag po ne bai pA la zhes bya ba'i mtho ris dang / thar pa'i them skas mkhas shing btsun la dul ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi bzhugs gnas su mdzad pa'i gtsug lag khang dza gang dA la na mkhas pa'i skye dgu paN+Di ta rnams mang du byung zhing / mang gis kyang chen po las chen por gyur pa/ lnga brgya pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'jig rten las sgrogs pa/ sngon gyi slob dpon chen po rnams dang mtshungs pa yin zhes bya ba'i bsngags pas paN+Di ta rnams kyis bsngags par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pas nga rgyal ba'i rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis lus kyi mgo ltar gnyan par khur ba/ mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can paN+Di ta'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyis gtsug lag gi nor bu ltar 'dzin pa/ tshe 'di ring du spangs pa'i skye bo thar pa bsgrub pa la brtson pa rnams kyis skyon yon legs par mthong bas lam 'dren pa'i mig dang 'dra bar lta ba/ yul gyi mi thams cad kyis bu gcig pa ltar snying du sdug pa'i 'thun par gyur pas/ dmu rgod lta bur log par sgrub pa rnams ches 'thun par 'dzin pas yid 'phrog par mdzad pas 'gro ba nyams thag pa rnams gzigs nas/ brtse ba'i zug rngus sems gdungs kyang thugs rje'i phyag brkyang bas skal pa dang 'thun par rjes su 'dzin par mdzad pa/ spyir lung bstan pa'i mdo sde stag rna'i rgyu skar las yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang / rtsom pa po chen po nyid dang / lus brjes nas mtho ris su skye ba bzhes pa/ lung bstan pa/ 'phags pa byams pa dang mjal bar bzhed pa'i sred pa dang /chos kyi sred pa bla lhag pa mnga' ba/ chags sdang la sogs pa thams cad ni shas chung bar gyur pa'i skyes bu de'i bsngags pa spro bar ni sus nus/ mdor bsdu na/ 'jig rten mi chos kyi mkhyen pa che zhing bzang ba/ gser gyi sa gzhi dang 'dra ba la/ dam pa'i lha chos phun sum tshogs pa mkhas pa dang / btsun pa dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / mnyen pa dang des pa dang/ bden par smra ba/ g.yo med pa/ drang po'i rang bzhin can/ bsgrub pa la snying por mdzad pa'i dpag bsams kyi ljon shing lo 'dab rgyas pa g.yu'i maN+Dala dang mtshungs par 'khrungs pa las/ tshe 'di dang / gzhan dang / gnas skabs dang / mthar thug pa'i dge ba'i lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog dang 'bras bu yongs su rgyas shing rnam par smin pas bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i pha rol tu phyin byon pas cung zad kyang don med pa ma yin pa/ rig pa'i gnas lnga la thogs pa med pa'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i dpal gyis mdzes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta A ka ra gup+ta'i zhal snga nas dang / mkhas pa chen po skyes bu dam pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i yang mchog tu gyur pa paN+Di ta chen po a b+ha yA ka ra gup+ta dang / thos pa 'dzin pas 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar grags pa spobs pa'i shes rab can rnams kyi mchog paN+Di ta chen po shAkya rak+Shi ta dang / paN+Di ta chen po bIR+Ya A ka ra shAn+ti la sogs pa rnams la rgya dpe lnga dang / gzhan yang yul dbus ma ga d+hA zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rten mang du bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas pa'i skye bo dkon mchog gsum la dad pas yul gang ba'i ma ga d+ha'i yul smad na/ rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' de ba pA las mdzad pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po bstan pa'i mig tu gyur pa bri kA ma shi la na yang mkhas pa'i skye bo mang du zin kyang rak+Shi ta de nyid dang / sgra dang / snyan dngags dang/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi lugs la mkhas pa'i paN+Di ta chen po su bu ti tsan+d+ra dang / mngon pa la mkhas pa a Di ta tsan+d+ra la sogs pa rnams la rgya dpe gnyis la legs par mnyan cing gus pas thad du bsten nas don dang tshig ma lus par rtogs pa'i bshad pa zhus nas / shin tu dka' ba'i gnas rnams la ni phyi zhing legs par dpyad pas don dgrol ba'i thabs zhus te/ 'gyur gyi yan lag rgya gar gyi saM skr-i ta dang / 'phral skad gnyis/ bod kyi chos skad dang 'phal skad gnyis te/ bzhi la dbang 'byor ba'i shes rab kyi snang ba thob mod kyis kyang/ spyir mdo sde la don gyi gnas mang bas tshig don phal cher ba rnyings shing lhag par yang mdo 'di don du ma tshig zur rnams kyis ngag gcig tu 'brel bar ston pa ni tshig mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis don gsal bar mdzad pa snyan dngags kyi dbang phyug/ 'gran gyi do med pa rnams kyi mdzad pa'i rim pa yin pa'i phyir na/ sbyangs pa zhan pa rnams la sla ba ma yin la/ khyad par du yang gzhung nyung bas don du ma ston pa'i mdo dun ma bu rnams ni spyir sor bsgyur bar mngon yang / blo'i nor can rnams kyis ni de nyid la don du ma nges nus la/ bye brag tu gsal btab na ni don cig ston par 'khrul ba'i phyir dang / tshig ji tsam pas brjod pa de tsam du bsgyur bar rigs pa'i yang phyir te/ mdor na rgya bod kyi don thun mong pa brda tha dad pa'i byed pa ma nyams par byas nas / sngon gyi bsgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi bkas bcad la sogs pa'i lugs dang yang mi 'gal bar byang phyogs pa tshab kyi rgyud du skyes pa'i dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis dam pa'i chos la gus pas/ rgya gar gyi rgyal po phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dbang phyug gzhan bas ches mtho ba dang ldan pa ram ba la'i ring la/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba shas shig 'gyur ba 'phro yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bsgyur ba'o/ /slad kyis zhu thug la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhang bu gcig pa zhes bya ba rab tu grags shing skye dgu rnams sgrogs pa yang/ 'jig rten pa ni rang la phan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis brjod pa de dag rnams kyi gshis yin pa'i phyir te/ skyes bu des ni sems can la bu gcig pa la bzhin du dgongs pas sras gcig pa'o/ /des ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mtshon no/ /chos la gnas pa rnams shes rab 'od ces grags pa yang / theg pa'i rim pa dang mthun par mkhyen cing bden pa gnyis la sogs pa'i sgor bsdu ba dang / mos pa dang / nges pa dang / mngon du rtogs shing shes nas rang dang gzhan nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa'i mun pa 'joms pa'i 'od mdzad pa'i phyir te/ des ni shes rab chen po dang ldan pa dang / bdag gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/ /dam pa'i skye bo des grogs mdzad nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan nyid kyis dag par byas so/ /de ltar na dang po'i gzhi 'gyur dang / zhu chen dang / tshig don gyi 'brel dpyad pa dang / zhu chung dang yang 'brel dpyad pa dang / lngar zhus shing gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o/ /dam chos mdo sde rin chen theg pa kun gyi gzhi dang rtsa ba bcud du gyur pa'i theg chen dran gzhag 'di/ /legs bsgyur dngos dang de'i grogs byed thams cad dang ni nam mkha' mthas gtugs 'gro kun dge ba dri med kyis/ /srid na bde sbyin skyabs gnas rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'bras ldan sa'i gnas skabs ljon shing lo 'dab phun tshogs shog /dang por tshe 'di brjes nas sangs rgyas zhing dag skye zhing 'khor tshe gzhan la phan pa 'ba' zhig byed par shog /bam po'i grangs su na ma bcad do//gzhung tshad ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug du rgya dpe rang la bzhugs so/ /yi ge'i brda sngon gyi rnying pa dang mi 'dra ba cung zad snang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sh+lau ka sum brgya la bam por bcad na brgya nyi shu'o
288 Pj067-001 mdo Sha 282a1-299b5 mdo chen po sgyu ma'i dra ba zhes bya ba mA yA dzA laM nA ma ma hA sU tra mdo chen sgyu ma'i dra ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
289 Pj067-002 mdo Sha 299b5-306b4 mdo chen po gzugs can snying pos bsu ba zhes bya ba Bim+bi sA ra pra tudga ma naM nA ma ma hA sU tra mdo chen po gzugs can snying pos bsu ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
290 Pj067-003 mdo Sha 306b4-311a4 mdo chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba shU nya tA nA ma ma hA sU tra mdo chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
291 Pj067-004 mdo Sha 311a4-321b3 mdo chen po stong pa nyid chen po zhes bya ba ma hA shU nya tA nA ma ma hA sU tra mdo chen po stong pa nyid chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
292 Pj067-005 mdo Sha 321b3-326a2 mdo chen po rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba d+hva dzA gran nA ma ma hA sU traM mdo chen po rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
293 Pj067-006 mdo Sha 326a2-328a5 mdo chen po rgyal mtshan dam pa zhes bya ba d+hva dzA gran nA ma ma hA sU tra mdo chen po rgyal mtshan dam pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
294 Pj067-007 mdo Sha 328a5-339a3 mdo chen po lnga gsum pa zhes bya ba panytsa tri ya nA ma ma hA sU traM mdo chen po lnga gsum pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
295 Pj067-008 mdo Sha 339a3-364a5 'phags pa rdo 'phangs pa'i mdo A r+ya shi la k+Ship+ta sU tra 'phags pa rdo 'phangs pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ /lo ts+tsha ba bzang skyong gis bsgyur/ dpal brtsegs kyis zhu chen bgyis
296 Pj067-009 mdo Sha 364a5-366a4 gzhon nu dpe'i mdo ku mA ra driSh+TAn+ta sU tra gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdo rdzogs so
297 Pj067-010 mdo Sha 366a4-372a2 khams mang po'i mdo d+hA tu ba hu ka sU tra khams mang po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so
298 Pj067-011 mdo Sha 372a2-375a4 gaN Di'i mdo gaN dI sU tra gaN Di'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab pa
299 Pj067-012 mdo Sha 375a4-376b1 gaN Ti'i dus kyi mdo gaN dI sa ma ya sU tra 'phags pa gaN+DI'i dus kyi mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur
300 Pj067-013 mdo Sha 376b1-377a7 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa'i mdo A r+ya kal+yA Na mi tra se ba na sU tra 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa'i mdo rdzogs so
301 Pj068-001 mdo Sa 1b1-157a7 mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo a b+hi niShkra ma Na sU tra mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsaR+Ya d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
302 Pj068-002 mdo Sa 157a7-159a5 dge slong la rab tu gces pa'i mdo zhes bya ba b+hi k+Shu pra re dzu sU tra nA ma dge slong la rab tu gces pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so
303 Pj068-003 mdo Sa 159a5-160a5 tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo shI la saM yuk ta sU tra tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo rdzogs so
304 Pj068-004 mdo Sa 160a5-163b3 ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo panytsA pat+ti ni kA la shu b+hA shu b+ha pha la pa rI k+Sha sU tra ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsaR+Ya dz+nyA na shrI gup+ta dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa
305 Pj068-005 mdo Sa 163b3-164b2 mchog tu gdags pa'i mdo
mchog tu gdags pa'i mdo rdzogs so
306 Pj068-006 mdo Sa 164b2-173b5 rnam par grol ba'i lam las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa zhes bya ba bi muk+ta mArga d+hu ta gu Na nirde sha nA ma rnam par grol ba'i lam las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa zhes bya ba ste kun nas btus pa gsum pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
307 Pj068-007 mdo Sa 173b5-181b6 tshe'i mtha'i mdo A yu paryan+ta sU tra tshe'i mtha'i mdo rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de deg ba'i dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs gyis zhu chen bgyis ge gtan la phab pa
308 Pj068-008 mdo Sa 181b6-193a3 tshe 'pho ba ji ltar 'gyur ba zhus pa'i mdo A yuH pat+ti ya thA kA ro pa ri pri ts+tshA sU tra 'chi 'pho ba ji ltar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ bstan pa snga dar ba'i tshe 'gyur ba las skad gsar chad kyis kyang ma bcos pa'o
309 Pj068-009 mdo Sa 193a3-194a1 mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo a ni tya tA sU tra mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus nas skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bsnan nas gtan la phab pa
310 Pj068-010 mdo Sa 194a1-195b7 mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo a ni tya tA sU tra mi rtag pa nyi kyi mdo rdzogs so
311 Pj068-011 mdo Sa 195b7-196a7 'phags pa 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa'i mdo A r+ya saM dz+nyA na e ka da sha nir de sha sU tra 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa bcom 'das kyi zhal chems rdzogs so
312 Pj068-012 mdo Sa 196a7-200b7 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po A r+ya bai shA lI pra be sha ma hA sU tra 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po rdzogs so
313 Pj068-013 mdo Sa 200b7-203b5 'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo A r+ya b+ha dra ka rA trI nA ma sU tra 'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so
314 Pj068-014 mdo Sa 203b5-210a6 mun gyi nags tshal gyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo ta mo ba na mu kha nA ma sU tra mun gyi nags tshal gyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ byang phyogs rgyud kyi phreng ba'i mdo khri pa'i nang nas yul za len+d+ra'i byang phyogs kyi mtshams kyi ri/ u shi ri'i bsngags pa'o

360 Pj080-001 rgyud Ka 1b1-15b3 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na sa tva sya pa ra mArtha nA ma saM gI ti 'phags pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las phyung ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ /thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor ba'i bdag nyid chen po bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs pa/ sgra bsgyur kyi lo ts+tsha ba blo gros brtan pas/ bsam gtan gling gis dben gnas su bsgyur zhing dag par byas pa'o/ /sngon gyi sgra bsgyur chen po de dag gis/ /rgyud 'di bsgyur zhing kun la grags lags mod/ /'on kyang sgra don gtsug lag ji bzhin du// rgyud 'di blo brtan gnyis pas legs par bsgyur// zab cing rgya che rdo rje theg pa yi/ nges don yi shes don gnyer skyes bu dag/ chos dang don la legs par mi rton par/ gang zag tshig 'bru'i rjes su ma 'brang zhig//

376 Pj082-003 rgyud Ga 47b7-56b2 rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor gyi rgyud ces bya ba tsa tur yo gi nI saM bu Ta tan+t+ra nA ma rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/// dpal o d+han nas nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las/ /'jigs rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje slob dpon dpal in dra b+hU ti'i zhabs kyis bkod cing gsal bar mdzad pa'o/ /bod kyi lo tsa ba la chings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur te/ slad kyis de nyid kyi tshe paNDi ta gnyis la yang dag par gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o

378 Pj082-005 rgyud Ga 65a2-77a1 mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba DA ki nI sarba tsit+ta a dva ya a tsin+ta dz+nyA na badzra bA rA hi a b+hi b+ha ba tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba rtsa ba'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed he ru kas gsungs rdzogs so

rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ya stha pa ga ya d+hA ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ /bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhu sa te gtan la phab pa/ slad nas yang bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba gzhan rnams kyis bsgyur ba la zur mi 'dra bar bcos nas rang gi ming bcug cing/ gzhan gyi ming 'phyi ba de dag dang/ mi shes pa de dag sun dbyung ba'i phyir slad nas yang rgya gar gyi rgyud bzhi dang/ dge slong shAkya ye shes de nyid kyis gtugs nas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o

416 Pj082-043 rgyud Ga 302a5-339a7 dpal rdo rje nag po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud shrI badzra ma hA kA la kro d+ha nA tha ra ha sya sid+d+hi b+ha ba tan+t+ra nA ma dpal mgon po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa/ bstan pa 'dzin pa/ bstan pa skyong ba/ bstan pa srung nges pa/ gsang ba bdud dpung 'dul bar byed pa'o// pal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud kun kyi snying por gyur pa gdod nas grub pa'i bla ma yin no// rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA paNDita a b+ha ya ka ra gup+ta'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba mkhas pa chen po khe rgad 'khor lo grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o

rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu ma'i brtag pa zhes bya ba brtag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis las phyung ba brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slar ang lo ts+tsha ba gzhon hu dpal gyis 'gyur chad bsabs shing dag par bgyis pa'o
419 Pj083-003 rgyud Nga 39a2-82b5 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtag pa A r+ya DA ki nI badzra pany+dza ra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza kal+pa nA m 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o
420 Pj083-004 rgyud Nga 82b5-112b7 dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag shrI ma ha mudrA ti la kaM nA ma ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza a d+hi pa ti dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag ces bya ba rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi slob dpon rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhal sngar kaM chos kyi ye shes dang / phyug mtshams dgra bcom gyis dad cing gus pas zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
421 Pj083-005 rgyud Nga 112b7-119b4 dpal ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po shrI dz+nyA na gar b+ha nA ma yo gi nI ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza ya ti rA dza dpal ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhal snga nas bsgyur ba'o// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i phyi ma'i phyi ma'o
422 Pj083-006 rgyud Nga 119b4-165b2 dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba shrI dz+ny na ti la ka yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza pa ra ma ma hA adb+hu taM nA ma dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI pradz+nyA gup+tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su zhu thig g.yar khral bgyis so
423 Pj083-007 rgyud Nga 165b2-172b2 dpal de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shrI tatva pra tI paM nA ma yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dzA dpal rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po mchog chen po rmad du byung zhing/ rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pradz+nyA shrI gup+ta bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ dus phyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas so
