434 Pj084-003 rgyud Ca 17a1-19b1 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gsang rgyud chen po A r+ya a tsa la ma hA gu hya tan+t+ra 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po rdzogs so
435 Pj084-004 rgyud Ca 19b1-32b3 rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud badzra a mr-i ta tan+t+ra rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud lo tsa ba gyi co zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
436 Pj084-005 rgyud Ca 32b3-35a5 rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba ku la lo ka nA tha panytsa da sha ka nA ma zhes pa ni dpal padma 'bar ba'i rgyud chen po las phyung ba rigs 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa rdzogs so// paNDi ta chen po bi ma la shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas/ byang chub rin chen gyis bskul nas/ shud ke grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o
437 Pj084-006 rgyud Ca 35a5-50b2 'phags pa sgrol ma ku ru ku lle'i rtog pa A r+ya tA re ku ru kulle kal+pa 'phags ma sgrol ma ku ru kulle'i rtog pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriS+Na paNDi ta dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
438 Pj084-007 rgyud Ca 50b2-52a2 sgrol ma la phyag tshal nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bstod pa phan yon dang bcas pa na maH tA rA e ka biM sha ti sto tra gu Na hi ta sA ka bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la phyag tshal ba nyi shus rtsa gcig gis bstod pa sgrol ma las sna tshogs bstan pa'i rgyud las phyung ba rdzogs so
439 Pj084-008 rgyud Ca 52a2-54a6 rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dum bu badzra kI la ya mU la tan+t+ra khaNDA rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dum bu slob dpon padma 'byung gnas dngos kyi rgya dpe dang 'thun par/ dpal ldan sa skya paNDi tas/ g.yas ru'i sa'i cha/ shangs kyi sreg zhing du bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o
440 Pj084-009 rgyud Ca 54a6-99b7 nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po ma hA kA la tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma ldang 'phrul gyi gtsug lag khang chen po ra sa ra mo cher pha rgyal khams pas zhus pa'i don du/ paNDi ta chen po sa man+ta shrI dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ra dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
441 Pj084-010 rgyud Ca 99b7-103b4 ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud ya thA labd+ha kha sa ma tan+t+ra nA ma ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po kSa ka ga Na dang/ lo tsa ba mang 'or dge slong byang chub shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
442 Pj084-011 rgyud Ca 103b4-170a1 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAktsit+ta ra ha syo gu hya sa mA dza nA ma ma hA kal+pa rA dza de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs gsang zhing rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tsa r+ya shrad d+ha ka ra warma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis paNDi ta bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i zhal snga nas chag lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis gus pas zhus shing dag par bcos te gtan la phab pa
443 Pj084-012 rgyud Ca 170a1-180b2 rgyud phyi ma
rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tsa r+ya shrad d+ha ka ra warma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
444 Pj084-013 rgyud Ca 180b2-237a5 dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud san d+hi byA ka ra Na nA ma tan+t+ra dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmma shrI b+ha dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
445 Pj084-014 rgyud Ca 237a5-315b5 rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par brjod pa rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba shrI badzra mA la a b+hi d+hA na ma hA yo ga tan+t+ra sarba tan+t+ra hr-i da ya ra ha sya bi b+hang kaA i ti rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po su dza na shrI dz+nyA na dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba chen po bod kyi lha btsan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
446 Pj084-015 rgyud Ca 315b5-320b1 lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa tsa turde bI pa ri pr-its+tshA thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa dpal au r+ya gyi yul nas byung ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i de kho na nyid rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan smri ti dz+nyA na kirti nyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o
447 Pj084-016 rgyud Ca 320b1-325a7 ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud badzra dz+nyA na sa muts+tsha ya nA ma tan+t+ra ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur/ slad nas bla ma de nyid dang/ dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o// ye shes rdo rje kun las btus// rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin// ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang// mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo 'o// de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste// kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus// de ston pa la der brtags nas// gzhung la'ang ming don 'tshams pa yin
450 Pj085-001 rgyud Cha 1b1-38b4 dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa shrI dz+nyA na badzra sa muts+tsha ya slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pa las rim par brgyud pa/ dpal nA ro pa'i slob ma kha che paNDi ta A ka ra singnghi dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims kyis zhus shing gtan la phab pa
451 Pj085-002 rgyud Cha 38b4-61b7 dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud ces bya ba shrI badzra hri da ya a laM kA ra tan+t+ra nA ma dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud rnal 'byor chen po'i de kho na nyid nges pa ces bya ba/ dpal auryan gyi gsang ba'i dgon pa nas byung ba rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
452 Pj085-003 rgyud Cha 61b7-109a7 'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po A r+yA dA ya sa ma tA bi dza yA khyA bi kal+pa ma hA rA dza
453 Pj085-004 rgyud Cha 109a7-379a7 dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje dpal mchog chen po brtag pa dang po shrI sarba ta thA ga ta gu hya tan+t+ra yo ga ma hA rA dza dva ya sa ma tA bi dza ya nA ma badzra shrI pa ra ma hA kal+pA di
454 Pj086-001 rgyud Ja 1b1-3b7 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud A r+ya nI lAm ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ru dra tri bi na tan tra nA ma 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// bal po'i paNDi ta de ba pu Nya ma ti dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
455 Pj086-002 rgyud Ja 3b7-8b7 gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba bi b+hang+ga gu hya tan+t+ra NAM tri ru dra da ma naM nA ma rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba pu Nya ma ti dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
456 Pj086-003 rgyud Ja 8b7-13b1 lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga rdo rje be con gyi rgyud badzra pA Ni nI lAm ba ra bi d+hi badzra daNDa tan tra 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga rdo rje be con gyi rgyud rdzogs so
457 Pj086-004 rgyud Ja 13b1-16b6 lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje gdengs pa'i rgyud khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni badzra pha Na ka tan+t+ra trai lo kya bi dza ya nA ma bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi rdo rje gdengs pa'i rgyud las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so// paNDi ta a Da ya shrI ma ti zhes bya ba dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba ban de chos kyi dbang phyug grags: kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
458 Pj086-005 rgyud Ja 16b6-34b3 dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud shrI badzra tsaNDa tsit+ta gu hya tan tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po a ba yu ga ta'i zhal snga nas zhus nas/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so
459 Pj086-006 rgyud Ja 34b3-41b4 dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma shrI badzra tsaNDa tsit+ta gu hya tan+t+ra ut+ta ra dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi slob dpon a bi yu ga ti la dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bla ban chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
460 Pj086-007 rgyud Ja 41b4-45a7 dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma shrI badzra tsaNDa tsit+ta gu hya tan+t+ra ut+ta rot+ta ra dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi slob dpon a bi yu ga ti la dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bla ban chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
946 Pj086-008 rgyud Ja 45a7-45b2
rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so
461 Pj086-009 rgyud Ja 45b2-75b4 phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje me lce'i rgyud ces bya ba Ni lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ak+Sha ma hA ru dra badzra na la dzi hva tan+t+ra nA ma phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje me lce'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ratna kIrti dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge tshul khyung grags kyis bka' drin mnos nas rgya dpe bod du spyan drangs te bsgyur ba lags so
462 Pj086-010 rgyud Ja 75b4-78a3 rdo rje snying po rdo rje lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs badzra hri da ya badzra dzihbA na la nA ma d+hA ra NI
463 Pj086-011 rgyud Ja 78a3-79b4 dpal phyag na rdo rje gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud shrI gu hya badzra pA Ni a b+hi de sha tan+t+ra nA ma dpal phyag na rdo rje gtum po gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi paNDi ta wa la tsan+dra dang/ lo ts+tsha ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
464 Pj086-012 rgyud Ja 79b4-104b2 bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba b+ha ga bAn badzra pA Ni gu hya a b+hi de sha tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsan+dra gu ru chen po dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis byang phyogs sham+b+ha la'i dpe dang bstun te bsgyur ba'o// slad kyis yul dbus kyi dpe dang/ kha che nas byung ba dang bstun nas legs par gtan la phab pa'o
465 Pj086-013 rgyud Ja 104b2-108a2 rdo rje bde khros rgyud kyi rgyal po badzra su kha kro d+ha tan+t+ra rA dza dz+nyA na ka ras bsgyur ba'o
466 Pj086-014 rgyud Ja 108a2-154a2 rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba mA yA dzA la ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba theg pa chen po'i yang theg pa chen po'i tshul zab mo gsang ba bas ches gsang ba chen po rdzogs so// bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
467 Pj086-015 rgyud Ja 154a2-173b3 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAktsit+ti kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri nA ma tan+t+ra de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po mkhas pa dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// slad kyis lo tsa ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis bcos la/ de las kyang dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bcos so
468 Pj086-016 rgyud Ja 173b3-187a6 dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi chen po rgyud ces bya ba shrI badzra ma hA b+hai ra ba nA ma tan+t+ra dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud 'bum pa nas btus nas phyung ba rtog pa'i phyogs bklags pas 'grub pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyis dngos grub 'grub pa'i rtogs pa rdzogs so// dpal o r+yana gyi gnas chen po nas dpal 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po zhes bya ba bla ma dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon dpal lA li ta badzrasa bton nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi paNDi ta mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa b+ha ro phyag rdum gyi zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o
469 Pj086-017 rgyud Ja 187a6-191b1 dpal gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rtog pa gsum pa zhes bya ba shrI kriSh+Na ya mA ri tan+t+ra rA dza tri kal+pa nA ma dpal gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rtog pa gsum pa rdzogs so
470 Pj086-018 rgyud Ja 191b1-198a4 dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shrI badzra b+hai ra ba kal+pa tan+t+ra rA dza dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las kyi dngos grub brtag pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// paNDi ta chen po a mo gha'i zhabs nus pa can dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba mar pa ban d+he chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// slad kyis grub thob chen po karNa shrI'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/ thar pa lo ts+tsha ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
471 Pj086-019 rgyud Ja 198a4-199a4
gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa rdzogs so
472 Pj086-020 rgyud Ja 199a4-200a5 te'u lo pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba ts+tshu ts+tshun d+ha ra kal+pa na maH tsU tsUn d+ha'i rtog pa zhib mo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba rva rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o
473 Pj086-021 rgyud Ja 200a5-212b2 gshin rje gshed dgra nag po'i 'khor lo las thams cad grub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po ya mA ri kr-iSh+Na karmma sarbba tsa kra sid+d+ha ka ra nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza gshin rje gshed dgra nag po'i 'khor lo las thams cad grub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// paNDi ta bA ro phyag rdum gyi zhal sna nas/ rva rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
474 Pj086-022 rgyud Ja 212b2-246a7 dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po shrI rak+ta ya mA ri tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// yon tan mtha' yas pa mnga' ba'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che'i bka' lung gis/ dpon chen kun dga' bzang pos yon bdag byas pa'i dus na/ kha che'i paND i ta ra hu la shrI b+ha dra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong blo brtan gyis/ dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o
475 Pj086-023 rgyud Ja 246a7-282b7 dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba shrI mAM rak+ta ya mA ri tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// skad gnyis smra ba chen po thar pa lo tsa ba'i bka' drin gyis bskyangs pa/ bod kyi lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis/ chos kyi rje khro phu lo ts+tsha ba'i gdan sa gnas gsar dgon par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyud 'di 'gyur las 'bad pa'i bsod nams kyis// nag po'i rtsa lag ma lus kun bcom ste// bstan pa'i bya ba yid bzhin 'grub pa dang// mthar thug 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid gyur cig
476 Pj086-024 rgyud Ja 282b7-286a4 dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba shrI b+ha ga bAn e ka dza Ta ma hA kal+pa tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa rtag pa rdo rje'i rgyud chen po bla na med pa rdzogs so// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shri dza ga ta mi tra A nAN dA'i bka' drin la brten nas/ rgya gar gyi paND i ta chen po ba dzra shrI kha la ru tra dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o
477 Pj086-025 rgyud Ja 286a4-353a7 dpal zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po shrI tsan+dra gu hya ti la ka nA ma ma hAtan+t+ra rA dza zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs s+ho// zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
479 Pj087-001 rgyud Nya 1b1-156b3 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sarba ta thA ga ta tat+tva saM gra ha nA ma ma ha yA na sU tra de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rgyud nye bar bsdus pa dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// rgyug 'di la 'gyur byang mi snang na'ang/ paNDi ta shrad+hu ka ra warma dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur bar grags
480 Pj087-002 rgyud Nya 156b3-328a6 gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo badzra shi kha ra ma hA gu hya yo ga tan+t+ra gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badzri'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// bam po bcu gnyis pa'o
481 Pj088-001 rgyud Ta 1b1-12b5 thams cad gsang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po sarba sa ha syo nA ma tan-tra rA dzA thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po padma kA ra barma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
482 Pj088-002 rgyud Ta 12b5-67b6 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po trai lo kya bi dza ya ma hA kal+pa rA dzA 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po kun rdzogs so// 'di'i 'gyur la lo chen rin chen bzang pos bsgyur yang zer/ rnal 'byor rgyud la mkhas pa zha lu ba ye shes rgya mtshos tshig don la legs par dpyad nas zhus dag/ yang 'ga' zhig rmad ge blos bsgyur ro zhes kyang 'dod pa yod
483 Pj088-003 rgyud Ta 67b6-112b2 de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa zhes bya ba sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na ta dzo rA dza ta thA ga tArtha te saM myaksaM bud+d+ha sya kal+pa nA ma de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn ting garb+ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dza ya rakSi tas bsgyur cing zhus/ A tsArya rin chen mchog gis skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa
484 Pj088-004 rgyud Ta 112b2-113a1
mngon sbyod kyi las rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn-ti garb+ha dang/ lo tstsha ba bande dza ya rakShi tas bsgyur ba'o
485 Pj088-005 rgyud Ta 113a1-171b1 de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa zhes bya ba sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na te dzo rA dza sya ta thA ga ta syArha te saM saM myaksaM bud+hha sya kal+pai ka de sha nA ma de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su dong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po re ben dra de ba'i zhabs dang / bla ma paN chen skyes bu chen po mA Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas gus par mnyan te/ chag lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ spre'u lo dbyug gu zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum la/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thang po cher dbu gtsugs nas/ smin drug zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi snga dro'i bar zhag bco lngar 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'dren gyi lha'i sdings su tshar bar bgyis so/ dpal ldan rgyud rgyal ngan song dong ba yi/ brtag pa phyogs gcig sngar grags kha che nas/ chos rgyal ska drin paN chen sgra bsgyur mchogaskyes chen rnams kyis legs par dar ba mdzad/ 'di ni dpal ldan kun dga'i snying po dang / rje btsun 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa yi/ man ngag la rten rgya gar bal po na/yongs grags bla ma'i drin las kho bos bsgyur/ sgra gzhung bla ma'i gsung bzhin du/ gus bsgyur nongs pa mkhas chen rnams/ bzod mdzad de dges 'gro ba kun/ 'gro mgon thub chen nyid gyur cig
486 Pj088-006 rgyud Ta 171b1-176a2 rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud su pra ti ShTha tan-tra saM gra ha rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// kha che'i paNDi ta chen po dznyA na badzra dang lo tsA ba 'brod gi slong shes rab grags pas bsgyur ba'o
487 Pj088-007 rgyud Ta 176a2-202b3 dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po shrI pa ra mA di nA ma ma hA yA na kal+pa rA dzA bde ba chen po rdo rje don yon pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsarya shrAd d+ha ka ra barma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
488 Pj088-008 rgyud Ta 202b3-311b4 dpal mchog dang po'i sngags kyi rtog pa'i dum bu zhes bya ba shrI pa ra mA dya man-tra kal+pa khaNDa nA ma thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling du rgya gar gyi mkhan po paNDi ta mkhas pa chen po man tra ka la sha dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// lo tsa ba chen po rin chen bzang po yi// dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bsgyur ba la// bar bar dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas// bdag gis 'bad pas dpe btsal rnyed pas bsgyur
17 Pj088-009 rgyud Ta 311b4-319a7 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs so A rya pradznyA pA ra mi tA na ya sha ta panytsa sha ti kA 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs so
489 Pj089-001 rgyud Tha 1b1-89b7 dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po shrI badzra maNDa a laM ka ra nA ma ma hA tan tra rA dzA dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du ji ltar rnyed pa yongs su rdzogs so/// rigs gzugs skal bzang mang thos blo 'byor sogs// phun tshogs ldan pa dpal ldan chos rje yis// rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung zad ma rdzogs pa// dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzogs par bsgyur
490 Pj089-002 rgyud Tha 89b7-91a2 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A rya panytsa bingsha ti ka pradznyA pA ra mi tA mu kha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nyi shurtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// skad gsar chad kyos bcos nas gtan la phab pa
491 Pj089-003 rgyud Tha 91a2-132b5 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAktsit+ta gu hyAlaM kA ra byU ha tan-tra rA dza nA ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs gsang brgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po brda sprod pa chen po bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang/ bsgyur byed kyi mkhas pa sgra'i gzhung lugs la blo gros dkar ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas dam par bsgyur// mda' lnga'i gtsug ldan yid kyi srub shing gi// dregs pa'i dra ba rnam par dral ba'i phyir// rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho'i rgyal po ltar zab 'di// bsgyur la 'gal gang 'di la 'phags rnams dgongs
492 Pj089-004 rgyud Tha 132b5-172a2 'phags pa gsang ba nor bu thig le zhes bya ba'i mdo A rya gu hya ma Ni ti la ka nA ma sU tra mchog tu gsang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sbas pa'i mchog gi thig le zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i 'byung gnas rdzogs so// dam pa'i rgyud 'di gangs can 'di na sngon// rnam pa kun tu bsgyur ba ma rnyed nas// mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal dang ni// sgra rig kun dga' rgyal mtshan bdag gis bsgyur// dam pa'i bkas bskul nas ni gus pa yis// dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur// dge ba de yis sems can thams cad kyis// gsang don rtogs nas sangs rgyas sar 'gro shog
493 Pj089-005 rgyud Tha 172a2-300b2 rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul ba byin gyis rlob pa shin tu rgyas pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ma hA bai ro tsa na a b+hi saM bo d+hi bi kurbba ti a d+hiShThA na bai pu lya sU tra indra rA dza nA ma d+harmma pa ryA ya 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyal po gsang ba mchog gi rim par phye ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po byin gyis rlob pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
494 Pj089-006 rgyud Tha 300b2-371a7 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa mi g.yo ba de'i stobs dpag tu med pa brtul phod pa 'dul bar gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa A rya a tsa la ma hA kro d+ha rAdza sya sarba ta thA ga ta ta sya ba la y pa rimi ta bI ra bi na ya swa byA to nA ma kal+pa 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po chen po mi g.yo ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pas 'dul bar gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so// mi nyag rgyal po'i bka' lung gis rgya gar gyi mkhan po ush+ma rak+Shi ta'i zhal snga nas/ glan dge slong d+harma blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ dge slong yon tan rdo rjes gsol ba btab pa'o// phyis su'ang chos kyi rgyal po bkra shis rab brtan dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul ba bzhin/ lo tsa ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos rgya'i dpe la legs par gtugs te gtan la phab pa dang/ slar yang mi'i dbang po bkra shis rab brtan sog po 'phags kyi zhal snga nas kyi sku ring la/ dge slong A nan+da mang+ga lam gyis/ dpal 'khor bde chen gyi gtsug lag khang du/ bi ka ma la shI la'i gtsug gi rgya dpe la gtugs nas/ mi 'chos su mi rung ba rnams legs par bcos te dag par bgyis pa'o
495 Pj090-001 rgyud Da 1b1-188a5 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po A rya badzra pA Ni a b+hi She ka ma hA tan-tra 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
496 Pj090-002 rgyud Da 188a5-189b7 'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs A rya a ShTa de bi d+hA ra NI 'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI lendra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
497 Pj090-003 rgyud Da 190a1-201a3 bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rgyud ces bya ba b+ha ga bAn nI lAmba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni tan-tra na ma kha che'i paNDi ta tse lu dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// rdzogs so
498 Pj090-004 rgyud Da 201a3-207b3 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba'i rgyud A rya badzra pA Ni lAmba ra d+ha ra badzra pA tA la nA ma tan-tra rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba dge slong bya'i gdong pa can gyis bsgyur ba'o
499 Pj090-005 rgyud Da 207b3-213a4 rdo rje sa gsum du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po badzra b+hU mi tri tsa ra Ni rA dza kal+pa nA ma dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag khri srong lde btsan gyi bka' khrims su/ dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra badzra dang/ ra byid lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o
500 Pj090-006 rgyud Da 213a4-218a3 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud A rya badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra tri lo ka bi na ya nA ma tan-tra 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur
501 Pj090-007 rgyud Da 218a3-301a6 dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud tri sa ma ya byU ha rA dzA nA ma tan-tra dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las thun mong gi cho ga rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paNDi ta dang lo tstsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
502 Pj090-008 rgyud Da 301a6-332b7 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A rya sapta ta thA ga ta pUrba pra Ni d+hA na bi she Sha bistA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo brgyad brgya pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ shI len dra bo d+he dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa// // bya ba'i rgyud du gtogs so
503 Pj090-009 rgyud Da 332b7-345a7 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla baidurya'i 'do kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A rya b+ha ga bAn b+hau Sha dzye gu ru bai DU rya pra b+ha sya pUrbba pra Ni d+hA na bi she Sha bistA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DU rya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ dA na shI la dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas zhus zhing bsgyur te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos shing gtan la phab pa
504 Pj090-010 rgyud Da 345a7-348a6 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa baidurya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs A rya ta thA ga ta bai DU rya pra b+ha nA ma ba la d+ha na sa mA d+di d+hA ra NI 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bskyed pa baiDUrya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ dA na shI la dang su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hi paM ka ra shri dznyA na dang/ dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas tho ling gser khang du skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o

589 Pj093-039 rgyud Pha 274b5-280a6 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI kal+pa sa hi ta de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so
590 Pj093-040 rgyud Pha 280a6-281b4 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI kal+pa sa hi ta 'phags pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so
591 Pj093-041 rgyud Pha 281b4-287a2 'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs A rya sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI 'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
592 Pj093-042 rgyud Pha 287a2-289b1 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rtog pa sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI kal+pa rtog pa 'di yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdom brtson dam pa 'dul ba'i gtsug lag la zla med par smra ba ne'u mkhan po'i gsung bzhin du/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba gnas brtan dpal nyi ma rgyal mtshan bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du rang gis bsgyur ba'o
593 Pj093-043 rgyud Pha 289b1-300a3 kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs Sa man-ta mu kha pra be sha raSh+mi ni ma yoSh+NI Sha pra b+hA sa sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya sa ma ya bi lo ki te nA ma d+hA ra NI 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang/ dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ shI len dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
594 Pj093-044 rgyud Pha 300a3-300a6
gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho
595 Pj093-045 rgyud Pha 300a6-307b7 shes pas thams cad mthar phyin par grub pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i gzungs sarba pra dznyAn-ta pA ra mi ta sid+d+ha tsai tya nA ma d+hA ra NI bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs rdzogs so
596 Pj093-046 rgyud Pha 307b7-308a7
597 Pj093-047 rgyud Pha 308b1-310b5 snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs ka ru Na a gra nA ma d+hA ra NI snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so
598 Pj093-048 rgyud Pha 310b5- Ba 38b1 khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa gsang ba'i rgyud kro d+ha bi dza ya kal+pa gu hya tan-tra khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so
599 Pj094-001 rgyud, ba 38b1-39b2 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba Ar+ya badzra b+hai ra ba d+hA ra NI nA ma 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba// ma rungs pa phyir bzlog pa rdzogs so// //'phags pas gsungs pa'i gzungs rnams rnam mang yang/ rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal nas gsungs pa'i gzungs/ /bsrungs bya'i las bdun ldan pa'i gzungs mchog 'di/ /kun gyi thun mong ma yin rnam 'byor dam pa'i gzungs/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur nas/ bod kyi ban+de skyo 'od 'byung la gnang ngo
600 Pj094-002 rgyud, ba 39b2-41b6 (vol. 91) 'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs A r+ya ma hA daN+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI 'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa
